description: Detects RAR usage that creates an archive from a suspicious folder, either a system folder or one of the folders often used by attackers for staging purposes
author: X__Junior (Nextron Systems)
Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
name: Suspicious Greedy Compression Using Rar.EXE
query: (((process.executable.text:"*\\rar.exe") OR (winlog.event_data.Description:"Command line RAR") OR (process.command_line.text:("*.exe\ a\ *" OR "*\ a\ \-m*"))) AND (process.command_line.text:"*\ \-hp*" AND process.command_line.text:"*\ \-r\ *" AND process.command_line.text:("*\ C\:\\\\*.*" OR "*\ C\:\\\\\\*.*" OR "*\ C\:\\Users\\Public\\*" OR "*\ %public%*" OR "*\ C\:\\Windows\\*" OR "*\ C\:\\PerfLogs\\*" OR "*\ C\:\\Temp*" OR "*\ C\:\\$Recycle.bin\\*")))
